segments.text: I notice the warm light coming in from the window.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is carefully wiping down that plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She seems so dedicated to her routine chores.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But the overflowing sink is heartbreaking; water everywhere.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's ruining the cabinets and making the floor slippery.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She doesn't realize her foot is wet already.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is reaching for cookies on that shaky stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He looks determined, holding a plate in one hand.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: If he falls, it could be really painful.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl stands there, hoping for her share.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Their innocent mischief might lead to tears.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The peaceful garden view outside feels distant now.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel sorry for what might happen next.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This scene tugs at my heart with its hidden dangers.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Wish they could all just enjoy the day safely.
segments.speaker: PAR
